body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Belmont-Paul Women's Equality National Monument is open for guided tours only. Guided tour schedule:  Thursday tours at 11 a.m., 1 p.m., 3 p.m. Friday tours at  11 a.m., 1 p.m., 3 p.m. Saturday tours at 11 a.m., 1 p.m., 3 p.m.  Groups exceeding 25 individuals, please contact us to schedule a tour.
title: Belmont-Paul Women's Equality National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
